scripts.dev-estoqueuni: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && echo '✅ Containers reiniciados! Acesse: http://localhost' && sleep 2 && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f
scripts.dev-stop-estoqueuni: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && echo '✅ Containers parados!'
scripts.logs-prod-estoqueuni: ssh Linode_dallas 'cd /home/claudio/semtypescript/apps/estoqueuni && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f'
scripts.restart-backend-prod: ssh Linode_dallas 'cd /home/claudio/semtypescript/apps/estoqueuni && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml restart estoqueuni-backend && echo "✅ Backend reiniciado!"'
scripts.stop-backend-prod: ssh Linode_dallas 'cd /home/claudio/semtypescript/apps/estoqueuni && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml stop estoqueuni-backend && echo "✅ Backend parado!"'
scripts.stop-backend-ai-prod: ssh Linode_dallas 'cd /home/claudio/semtypescript/apps/estoqueuni && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml stop estoqueuni-backend-ai && echo "✅ Backend AI parado!"'
scripts.stop-all-prod: ssh Linode_dallas 'cd /home/claudio/semtypescript/apps/estoqueuni && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down && echo "✅ Todos os containers parados!"'
scripts.status-prod: ssh Linode_dallas 'cd /home/claudio/semtypescript/apps/estoqueuni && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml ps'
scripts.deploy-estoqueuni-dev: npm run test && npm run prebuild && vite build --mode staging --config vite.config.estoqueuni.js && npm run postbuild-dev
scripts.prebuild: npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run clean:lixo && npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run enable-upload
scripts.postbuild: bash ../../../frontend_project/upload-via-ssh.sh estoqueuni-www && npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run disable-upload && ssh Linode_dallas 'pm2 restart estoqueuni || pm2 start npm --name estoqueuni --cwd /home/claudio/apiNegocios360/apps/estoqueuni/backend -- start'
scripts.postbuild-dev: bash ../../../frontend_project/upload-via-ssh.sh estoqueuni-dev && npm --prefix ../../../frontend_project run disable-upload && ssh Linode_dallas 'pm2 restart estoqueuni-dev || pm2 start npm --name estoqueuni-dev --cwd /home/claudio/apiNegocios360/apps/estoqueuni/backend -- start'
